sidebar.title: Navigation Menu
sidebar.description: This is the main side menu. Here you can access all sections of the application, including Dashboard, User Management and Settings.

header.title: Top Bar
header.description: This is the top bar that displays the current section title. You will also find the button to switch between light and dark theme.

themeToggle.title: Theme Toggle
themeToggle.description: Click here to switch between the light and dark theme of the application.

dashboardCards.title: Statistics Cards
dashboardCards.description: These cards show the main dashboard metrics, including total users, revenue, orders and growth rate.

recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
recentActivity.description: In this section you can see the most recent activities and events in the system.

list.title: Users List

hero.title: React Boiler Plate
hero.subtitle: A complete, production-ready template for building modern React applications with TypeScript, Vite, and best practices.

summary.title: Resumen
summary.techDescription: The template includes 15+ modern technologies including React 19, TypeScript, Vite, Mantine UI, React Router, i18next, ESLint, Husky and more. All configured and ready to use.
summary.featuresDescription: 8 main features: fast development with Vite, strict TypeScript, modern UI with Mantine, light/dark themes, complete i18n, advanced routing, code quality and scalable architecture.
summary.languagesDescription: Complete support for multiple languages. Includes English (primary language) and Spanish. Easy to extend to add more languages using i18next.
summary.coverageDescription: 90% code coverage required. The project includes testing configuration with Vitest, pre-commit rules and automatic coverage validation.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Modern tools and libraries for building exceptional applications

descriptions.react19Description: React 19.2.0 - The latest version of the popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Includes new features like automatic batching, improved concurrent rendering, and better developer experience.
descriptions.typescriptDescription: TypeScript 5.9.3 - A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript. Provides static type checking, better IDE support, and improved code maintainability. Configured with strict mode enabled.
descriptions.viteDescription: Vite 7.2.2 - Next-generation frontend build tool that provides lightning-fast development server startup and Hot Module Replacement (HMR). Optimized for production builds with automatic code splitting.
descriptions.mantineDescription: Mantine UI 8.3.8 - A fully featured React components library with 100+ customizable components. Includes dark mode support, accessibility features, and a comprehensive theming system.
descriptions.reactRouterDescription: React Router 7.9.6 - Declarative routing for React applications. Supports nested routes, code splitting, and advanced navigation patterns. Configured with BrowserRouter for client-side routing.
descriptions.i18nextDescription: i18next 25.6.3 - Powerful internationalization framework for JavaScript. Supports multiple languages, automatic language detection, and translation management. Integrated with react-i18next for React components.
descriptions.framerMotionDescription: Framer Motion 12.23.24 - Production-ready motion library for React. Provides declarative animations, gesture support, and layout animations. Used for smooth transitions and interactive animations.
descriptions.vitestDescription: Vitest 4.0.10 - Fast unit test framework powered by Vite. Provides Jest-compatible API, native ESM support, and excellent TypeScript integration. Configured with 90% coverage threshold.
descriptions.eslintDescription: ESLint 9.39.1 - Pluggable JavaScript linter that helps identify and fix problems in code. Configured with TypeScript and React rules to maintain code quality and consistency.
descriptions.huskyDescription: Husky 9.1.7 - Git hooks made easy. Automatically runs linting, testing, and other checks before commits. Ensures code quality standards are maintained across the team.
descriptions.commitlintDescription: Commitlint 20.1.0 - Lint commit messages according to Conventional Commits specification. Ensures consistent commit message format (feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.) for better project history.
descriptions.mswDescription: MSW 2.12.2 - Mock Service Worker for API mocking in tests and development. Intercepts network requests and returns mock responses, enabling reliable testing without backend dependencies.
